meanings.definition: To cover or coat a surface with plaster again.
meanings.sent1: We are replastering the walls to make them smooth.
meanings.sent2: The workers are replastering the ceiling after removing the old plaster.
meanings.sent3: After the cat tried to climb the wall, we had to start replastering!
meanings.sent4: The artist's brush danced across the canvas, replastering it with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The sun's rays revealed every imperfection in the replastering job.

meanings.definition: The act of applying a new layer of plaster to a surface.
meanings.sent1: The replastering of the old building was a big project.
meanings.sent2: He learned the art of replastering from his grandfather.
meanings.sent3: The sudden rain turned the street into a replastering challenge!
meanings.sent4: The replastering of the statue brought out its original beauty.
meanings.sent5: The smoothness of the replastering made the wall look brand new.
